recipesJson.name: Bring me my spoon,Martha(an apricot cheesecake)
recipesJson.author: nks
recipesJson.description: This is an apricot cheesecake recipe,probably with a stupid name.i mixed it and forgot it for a couple of weeks,so i can't really say if this works as a snv.i guess it doesn't,it really needs at least a week of steeping,but in 2 weeks that it was tested it tastes fine

pageContext.name: Bring me my spoon,Martha(an apricot cheesecake)
